title: Anthem Next Is Dead - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.25.21
description:
Iron Galaxy Co-CEO Chelsea Blasko joins Greg to talk about the death of Anthem Next, Halo coming to TV, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:04:30 - Housekeeping
There’s a PlayStation State of Play TODAY. We’ll be live and reacting to it at 2 pm PT on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames, but if you’re watching later, those reactions will be on youtube.com/kindafunnygames.
We drafted a new FCF Team last night, and Saturday we take on the Zippers! Coverage starts at 4:30 p.m. pt on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: GrahamOfLegend, David Meintel, Trent Berrie, Black Jack, Luiz Aguiar (@8bitLuiz), James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), &The Nano Biologist
The Roper Report   -
00:05:45 - Anthem Next Is Dead, Christian Dailey @ BioWare
00:16:18 -  What’s Henry Cavill Doing with Mass Effect? Karol Laska @ Game Pressure
00:21:50 - It’s Real Bad over at CD Projekt, Jason @ Bloomberg
00:30:30 -  Ad
00:35:32 - Bravely Default 2 Review Round-up
00:38:55 - Amazon Luna Boss Bounces, @Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:40:20 - Is now the time to consider game streaming dead? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:43:20 - Pokemon Presentation Tomorrow
00:43:55 - Halo TV Series Moves to Paramount+, Nellie Andreeva @ Deadline
00:49:00 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:53:30 - I've just logged into Bloodborne (chasing the platinum) and was met with a message that servers will be down for several hours for essential maintenance on Tuesday morning. With a State of Play imminent, is this a reason to get excited for a 4k/60fps patch, or just a coincidence?  - Katie G
00:54:53 - Squad Up:Tyler Fisher(Pokémon Go) TJFtheGREAT
00:56:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Blessing
